changes: fix(persistence): Ensured the 'All-time incinerations' counter persists across browser refreshes by saving it to localStorage whenever it's updated.

fix(initialization): Corrected the initialization order in `main.js` and added defensive coding in `armory.js` to prevent crashes when `playerStats` are not yet loaded. This ensures that `loadSettings` and `loadPlayerStats` are called and completed before any UI components dependent on player stats are rendered.

fix(initialization): Corrected a critical initialization bug that caused the Armory's cash display to crash the application on first load. Player stats are now loaded before the UI is initialized, ensuring all data is available for rendering.
